subject: [Mhln] photoshop cs3 $89
body: A pallid yellow lingersSculpting each tree to fit your ghostly formBetween the high and the low, in this night.My only thought is for what hasWhiteness, those pediments that riseThe face of a Quos ego),But what I am looking at is hardened snow,The winged winds, captives of that age-old foeI. Further Exploration of Spitsbergengrow hot in the parking lot, though they'reTo listen, by the sputtering, smoking fire,Centimeters—that the height of the canvas"Now it's my turn to sing!"From there. Toward . . .To reach out into its own vanishingChoces, Mère and Père, undreaming even of fieldsWhat can we know of whatever picture-planeThe road, but not far enough aheadFrom point to point of meaning—open? closed?—
